content.content:
1. (1) For the period from April 1, 2000 to March 31, 2001, amounts not exceeding a total of $56,269,205,800 may be paid out of the Consolidated Revenue Fund to be applied to the operating and capital expenses of the public service, as set out in the Schedule, that are not otherwise provided for. 2000, c. 45, s. 1 (1). Votes and items (2) The money shall be applied in accordance with the votes and items of the estimates and supplementary estimates. 2000, c. 45, s. 1 (2). Expenditures (3) An operating or capital expenditure in the votes and items of the estimates and supplementary estimates may be made by the Crown through any ministry to which, during the fiscal year ended March 31, 2001, responsibility has been given for the program or activity that includes that expenditure. 2000, c. 45, s. 1 (3). 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Act). 2000, c. 45, s. 2. 3. Omitted (enacts short title of this Act). 2000, c. 45, s. 3. content.raw_html:
1. (1) For the period from April 1, 2000 to March 31, 2001, amounts not exceeding a total of $56,269,205,800 may be paid out of the Consolidated Revenue Fund to be applied to the operating and capital expenses of the public service, as set out in the Schedule, that are not otherwise provided for. 2000, c. 45, s. 1 (1).

Votes and items

(2) The money shall be applied in accordance with the votes and items of the estimates and supplementary estimates. 2000, c. 45, s. 1 (2).

Expenditures

(3) An operating or capital expenditure in the votes and items of the estimates and supplementary estimates may be made by the Crown through any ministry to which, during the fiscal year ended March 31, 2001, responsibility has been given for the program or activity that includes that expenditure. 2000, c. 45, s. 1 (3).

2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Act). 2000, c. 45, s. 2.

3. Omitted (enacts short title of this Act). 2000, c. 45, s. 3.
